text: Waterproof finished Touring package completely in waterproof sealed
Side release buckle adjustable velcro adjustable
Holding seat post light loop badge attached

WR-15818L.title: WR-15818L
text: Side Released Buckle adjustable fasten under saddle.
Adjustable velcro hold around the seat post for further security.
Reflective light loop patch, inner plastic sheet support keep the bag in the shape.

TR-17818.title: TR-17818
text: Waterproof pouch for Bike packing saddle bag.
With separated fasten holder, the inner pouch can be removable.
Two point fasten with bike, webbing go under saddle and velcro tight around the seat post.

WR-23840HD.title: WR-23840HD
text: Double side opening for easy storage.
Bag with foam packing protection, with adjustable velcro go around handlebar, extra 3rd webbing to tight around stem.
With reflective patch, attached elastic cord to more storage.

WR-23840HD-V-WOQ.title: WR-23840HD-V-WOQ
text: Double side opening for easy storage.
With side released buckle for closing .
Special Cradle support, with Quick Released buckle on Handlebar,
Extra webbing go around through Cradle and Stem.
Bag will be very secure on the Handlebar do keep the space from the cables.
With reflective patch, attached elastic cord to more storage.

WR-09107R.title: WR-23840HD-V-WOQ
text: Webbing with buckles fasten on Handlebar, With elastic cord plus adjustable pull for 3rd point tight with Bike,

text: Top roll down closing with buckle fasten.
